message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. Given its value to you, I believe this price represents an excellent opportunity for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better deal. Given my budget, I can offer $12,000 for the product. I believe this price is fair considering its value to both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to you and the market conditions, I am willing to negotiate further. My revised offer for the product is $13,000.
